Name: Data Handler P(aris)
Usability: Software lacks documentation, but usable.

Name: EcoSIS
Usability: Very good. Includes APIs for integration

Name: EcoSML
Usability: Poor. There isn’t a standard data format. Different datasets use different languages.

Name: HSDAR
Usability: No longer being supported

Name: hyperSpec
Usability: Documentation and tutorials slightly outdated, but usable.

Name: Hypro
Usability: Contains bugs preventing execution

Name: HyTools
Usability: Incomplete documentation, yet usable

Name: ISET
Usability: Usable datasets

Name: Mitsuba 3
Usability: Actively supported, need more specification on spectral outputs

Name: OpenHSI
Usability: Simulated camera usable, but loading datacubes cause error.

Name: PySptools
Usability: Outdated and no longer supported, but usable

Name: Spectral Python(SPy)
Usability: Contains bugs in its important feature of interactive displays

Name: Eradiate
Usability: Documentation seems very comprehensive, but was unable to run the tutorial

Name: ASWF
Usability: Potentially useful
Notes: A group supporting many open-source tools for animation, visual effects, and simulation. Some tools could be useful in the future

Name: Cloud Monte Carlo
Usability: Very usable with good documentation.

Name: NASA Openscapes
Usability: They seem to be doing similar work to what we are doing, but with NASA Earthdata. Not sure how helpful it can be to us.

Name: SeaDAS
Usability: Old interface but very usable. Allows easy visualizations of hyperspectual data of various formats.

Name: ICONES
Usability: Usable with other systems

Name: Hyperspectral Pigments
Usability: Usable with other systems

Name: Malia Rendering Framework
Usability: Download links for binary releases are broken. Fail to build from source code following the documentation (probably need to downgrade versions of dependencies). Well documented though.

Name: Golden Paint Spectra
Usability: Single-spreadsheet dataset

Name: PBR
Usability: Good documentation. Successfully built and run.

Name: RADIANCE
Usability: Fail to compile with my WSL system (fatal error: X11/Xlib.h: No such file or directory). Documentation might be a bit outdated, but pretty detailed.

Name: OpenEXR Spectral Image
Usability: Fail to build. (LNK1104 Can’t open file “..\..\lib\Debug\EXRSpectralImage.lib”) No documentation but provides sample code.

Name: DART
Usability: Needs license application. Didn’t test. Good documentation.

Name: SNAP
Usability: Good usability. Many tutorials and a forum.

Name: ENVI
Usability: Paid product. Didn’t test. Good documentation.

Name: Hyperspectral Near-infrared Dataset of Bulky Waste
